column3: I've brought everything I need into our camp here in Hydatos, but I shall need time to set up an efficient workspace. Any armor commissions will have to wait a little longer, I'm afraid.
You wish to have some armor forged? I am sorry, but I must insist that pieces made from Pyros materials be commissioned within the camp in Pyros.
What would you like to do?

Master Gerolt's reputation for excellence is, if anything, an understatement. His workmanship is exquisite─somehow both bold and breathtakingly delicate at the same time. Ah, I am privileged to behold such talent in such close proximity...

Master Drake's designs require specialized materials, but if followed precisely, then it should be possible to imbue your armor with enhanced elemental might. Such an exceptionally brilliant technique!
